Description: Freshly renovated (south west facing) two bed, two bath with hard wood floors throughout and crown molding. Central air/heat via electric heat pump. Small private patio outdoor.Fully applianced kitchen with garbage disposal, in unit washer dryer. Quiet corner unit in rear of building. No shared walls or floors. All energy efficient Led lights with most on dimmers. 10 min walk to Davis sq., Teele Square, 12 min to Alewife, 18 min to Porter Sq. Garage parking for compact car with storage.
